DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Face Paint Stencils - Celtic Knots
DescriptionData.Description:
Face Paint Stencils from Snazaroo make face painting easy for beginners. A simple aid for creating professional looking face painting designs in seconds. Stamp and repeat.
These stencils can be used thousands of times because they are composed of double-ply vinyl and made with Snazaroo's proprietary lamination process. They bend and shape to fit the curves of a face. Simply hold up the face painting stencil to the skin and fill in the stencil with face paint and you are done.
These stencils are great for parties, school events or any gathering of faces because anyone can face paint with Snazaroo stencils!
Snazaroo Celtic Knots Face Paint Stencils are 7.25 in x 8 in and a variety of Celtic Knots - a variety of knots and stylized graphical representations of knots. 1/pack
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Clean with a baby wipe or wet washcloth Store flat. If cared for properly, Snazaroo stencils will last for years, even with a lot of use
Celtic Knots Stencils include a variety of knots and stylized graphical representations of knots face painting designs
An easy way for beginner face painters to create fast exciting designs
Easy to bend and fit against a face Place against skin and paint; it's easy
Stencil sheet size is approximately 7.25 in x 7 in
